abstract: An object that contains a buffer of vertex indices of the geometry’s faces.
overview:
## Discussion

Each element of the buffer-based array is a three-index combination that forms a unique triangle, or *face*. The index refers to that vertex’s position in the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARMeshGeometry/vertices] array. The [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeometryElement/count] of this property represents the number of faces.
